name: Music feeling: Kpop ballad
description:
And don't be shy to record and share your play with others.

The game features 2 game modes: Story and Library.
In Story mode, you will play level-to-level follow the hidden story. After reaching the level 4, the Library mode is unlock
This is the list of levels in Story mode:
Chapter 1: Intro | Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet…
Chapter 2: First drops of rain | The rain begins with a single drop…
Chapter 3: On rainy days | The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
Chapter 4: If you… | She is leaving, love is leaving
Chapter 5: Goodbye, hello! | Love has come, but you say you’re leaving
Chapter 6: Sing for you | I’ll sing for you, just listen and smile…
Chapter 7: Because I'm stupid | Loving you is like having a beautiful wound
Chapter 8: Your eyes, nose and lips | With your pretty red lips, please hurry, kill me and go…
Chapter 9: Please don't | Don’t know why, don’t know why
Chapter 10: Because I miss you! | Now it’s like I have this habit, keep calling out your name!
